mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO , C.CART_NO , C.QUANTITY , C.PRICE AS CART_PRICE , G.GOODS_NO , G.CATEGORY , G.GOODS_NAME , G.PRICE AS GOODS_PRICE , GA.FILE_NO , GA.ORIGIN_NAME , GA.CHANGE_NAME FROM CART C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN GOODS G ON C.GOODS_NO = G.GOODS_NO JOIN GOODS_ATTACHMENT GA ON G.GOODS_NO = GA.ATTACHMENT_GNO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
